com.compendium.core.datamodel
Interface IPermission

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface IPermission
extends java.io.Serializable

The IPermission interface is provided for the Permission object. The Permission object represents the permission for a group to an object in the database representing a pc compendium object.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getGroupId()
          Returns the id of the group for which this permission is assigned.
 java.lang.String getObjectId()
          Returns the id of the object for which this permission is assigned.
 int getPermission()
          Returns the permission value.
 void setGroupId(java.lang.String id)
          Sets the group id for the group for which this permission is assigned.
 void setObjectId(java.lang.String id)
          Sets the object id for the object for which this permission is assigned.
 void setPermission(int permission)
          Sets the permission. this is the only property that can be altered on the client setting notifies the service, and fires property changes to GUI listeners
